mean_cn: adj. 除臭的，防臭的；  n. 除臭剂
mean_en: a substance that you put on your body and especially under your arms to prevent, remove, or hide unpleasant smells
sentence: I put deodorant on so my armpits don't smell so bad!
sentence_trans: 我喷了除臭剂，这样腋窝才不会那么臭！
word_etyma: de去掉 + odor气味 + ant名词后缀 → deodorant 除臭剂
